description: Try our easy to follow Granny's Golden Syrup Dumplings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Granny's Golden Syrup Dumplings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs golden syrup (plus 1/2 cup golden syrup extra)

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour and salt in a large bowl. Using fingertips, rub in butter until it resembles breadcrumbs. Make a well in the centre. Whisk egg, milk and syrup together. Pour into the well and, using a flat-bladed knife, stir mixture until it just comes together into a soft dough.

To make the syrup, combine 2 cups water, 1/2 cup golden syrup, 1/2 cup brown sugar and butter in a medium saucepan. Stir over low heat, without boiling, until sugar dissolves. Bring to the boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 2 minutes.

Using 2 dessertspoons, shape dough into tablespoon-sized balls and gently scrape off into simmering syrup. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Gently turn the dumplings over and poach for a further 5-10 minutes or until puffed and completely cooked through.
Divide dumplings among serving bowls. Stir lemon juice into syrup in pan and spoon generously over dumplings. Serve with ice-cream.
